statements: SELECT * FROM credit_utilization_ratio;
SELECT user_id, credit_limit, credit_balance FROM credit_utilization_ratio;
SELECT credit_balance, credit_limit, user_id FROM credit_utilization_ratio;
SELECT user_id, credit_balance FROM credit_utilization_ratio WHERE credit_balance > 500;
SELECT credit_limit FROM credit_utilization_ratio WHERE credit_balance < credit_limit;
SELECT user_id, credit_limit, credit_balance FROM credit_utilization_ratio WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY credit_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_utilization_ratio WHERE credit_balance < 1000;
SELECT user_id, credit_balance FROM credit_utilization_ratio WHERE credit_balance BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT credit_balance, credit_limit FROM credit_utilization_ratio WHERE credit_balance < credit_limit ORDER BY credit_balance ASC, credit_limit DESC;
SELECT user_id, credit_limit FROM credit_utilization_ratio WHERE credit_limit = (SELECT MAX(credit_limit) FROM credit_utilization_ratio);
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, credit_limit FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_utilization_ratio < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM credit_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, event_type FROM credit_events WHERE event_type IN ('approval', 'rejection');
SELECT user_id, event_date FROM credit_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT id, credit_limit, credit_utilization_ratio FROM credit_scores WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, credit_limit FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_utilization_ratio < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM credit_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, event_type FROM credit_events WHERE event_type = 'payment';
SELECT id, user_id, credit_limit, credit_utilization_ratio FROM credit_scores ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_utilization_ratios;
SELECT user_id, credit_balance FROM credit_utilization_ratios WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT user_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score >= 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM credit_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS largest_transaction FROM credit_transactions;
SELECT * FROM credit_utilization_ratios WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY credit_balance DESC
SELECT user_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 750
SELECT id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM credit_transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(credit_balance) AS total_balance FROM credit_utilization_ratios GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 10000
SELECT user_id, AVG(credit_score) AS avg_score FROM credit_scores GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT name, email FROM User;
SELECT id, name, email FROM User ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM CreditScore WHERE score > 700;
SELECT name, credit_limit, credit_balance FROM CreditUtilizationRatio;
SELECT * FROM CreditUtilizationRatio WHERE credit_balance > 2000;
SELECT User.name, CreditScore.score FROM User JOIN CreditScore ON User.id = CreditScore.user_id;

SELECT User.name, CreditHistory.id, CreditUtilizationRatio.credit_balance FROM User JOIN CreditHistory ON User.id = CreditHistory.user_id JOIN CreditUtilizationRatio ON CreditHistory.credit_utilization_ratio_id = CreditUtilizationRatio.id WHERE CreditUtilizationRatio.credit_balance < 5000;
SELECT CreditScore.score, CreditUtilizationRatio.credit_limit FROM CreditScore JOIN CreditUtilizationRatio ON CreditScore.user_id = CreditUtilizationRatio.user_id;
SELECT * FROM User WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM CreditScore;
SELECT id, user_id, credit_score FROM CreditUtilization;
SELECT user_id, credit_limit, card_number FROM CreditCard WHERE balance > 0;
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE amount_paid > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, credit_utilization_limit FROM CreditLimits;
SELECT id, user_id, credit_score FROM CreditScore WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CreditUtilization WHERE credit_utilization > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, card_number, balance FROM CreditCard ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM PaymentHistory WHERE amount_paid < 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, credit_utilization_limit FROM CreditLimits WHERE credit_utilization_limit BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.5;
